SystemTable.name: table_group
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `table_group` ( `id` bigint not null auto_increment, `gmt_create` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `schema_name` varchar(64) not null , `tg_name` varchar(64) not null, `locality` text default null, `primary_zone` text default null, `inited` int not null default 0, `meta_version` bigint unsigned not null default '1', `manual_create` int not null default 0 comment '0:create implicitly, 1:create manually', `tg_type` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:part_tg_group,1:default single_tg, 2:non default single_tg', primary key (`id`), unique key `uidx_tgname`(`schema_name`,`tg_name`, `meta_version`), key `db_tg`(`schema_name`, `tg_name`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: partition_group
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `partition_group` ( `id` bigint not null auto_increment, `partition_name` varchar(64) not null, `tg_id` bigint, `gmt_create` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `phy_db` varchar(64) not null , `locality` text default null, `primary_zone` text default null, `pax_group_id` bigint not null default -1, `meta_version` bigint unsigned not null default '1', `visible` int not null default '1', primary key (`id`), key `idx_tgid`(`tg_id`), unique key `u_pname`(`tg_id`,`partition_name`, `meta_version`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: partition_group_delta
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `partition_group_delta` ( `id` bigint not null default 0, `partition_name` varchar(64) not null, `tg_id` bigint, `gmt_create` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `phy_db` varchar(64) not null , `locality` text default null, `primary_zone` text default null, `pax_group_id` bigint not null default -1, `meta_version` bigint unsigned not null default '1', `type` int not null default 1 comment '1:new partition group 0:outdated partition group', `visible` int not null default '1', key `idx_tgid`(`tg_id`), unique key `u_pname`(`tg_id`,`partition_name`, `type`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: tablegroup_outline
SystemTable.Create:
create table if not exists `tablegroup_outline` ( `id` bigint(21) unsigned not null auto_increment, `batch_id` bigint unsigned not null, `job_id` bigint unsigned not null, `parent_job_id` bigint unsigned not null default '0', `gmt_create` datetime default current_timestamp, `gmt_modified` datetime default current_timestamp, `schema_name` varchar(64) not null, `table_group_id` bigint not null, `partition_group_name` varchar(64) not null comment 'partition group name', `table_name` varchar(128) not null comment 'group key', `partition_info` longtext comment 'json format, new partition meta', `type` int not null comment '1:split, 2:merge, 3:move', `status` int not null default 0 comment '0:creating,1:delete_only', `version` bigint(21) not null comment 'table meta version', `extra` longtext default null, `source_sql` text default null,
primary key(`id`), unique key `u_id`(`job_id`) ) charset=utf8mb4

SystemTable.name: complex_task_outline
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `complex_task_outline` ( `id` bigint(21) unsigned not null auto_increment, `job_id` bigint unsigned not null, `gmt_create` datetime default current_timestamp, `gmt_modified` datetime default current_timestamp, `table_schema` varchar(64) not null, `tg_name` varchar(64) not null default '-' comment 'tablegroup name', `object_name` varchar(128) not null, `type` int not null comment '1:split, 2:merge, 3:move', `status` int not null default 0 comment '0:creating,1:delete_only,2:xx', `extra` longtext default null, `source_sql` text default null, `sub_task` int not null comment '0:parent task, 1:sub task', primary key(`id`), key `k_job_id`(`job_id`), key `k_sch_obj`(`table_schema`, `object_name`, `sub_task`) ) charset=utf8mb4
